title: Add package file — add_pkg_file
text: desc_file DESCRIPTION file. Must provided, used extract package information. Using add_pkg_file("DESCRIPTION"), created <pkg_name>-package.R based DESCRIPTION file. want use specific information, author_name author_email, can provide manually. pkg_name Character string, name package. Default NULL, read DESCRIPTION file. pkg_description Character string, short description package. Default NULL, read DESCRIPTION file. author_name Character string, name package author. Default NULL, read DESCRIPTION file. author_email Character string, email package author. Default NULL, read DESCRIPTION file. github_url Character string, GitHub URL package. Default NULL, read DESCRIPTION file constructed based package name. output_dir Character string, directory save package file. Default NULL, specify , 'R/'. use_figlet Logical, whether use figlet ASCII art generation. Default TRUE. figlet_font Character string, figlet font use. Default "Slant". colors Character vector, colors use logo elements. unicode Logical, whether use Unicode symbols. Default TRUE. verbose Logical, whether print progress messages. Default TRUE.

title: Print diagnostic message — log_message
text: ... Text print. verbose Logical value, default TRUE. Whether print message. message_type Type message, default info. choose one info, success, warning, error. cli_model Logical value, default TRUE. Whether use cli package print message. timestamp Logical value, default TRUE. Whether show current time message. level Integer value, default 1. level message, affects indentation. Level 1 indentation, higher levels add indentation. level_symbol Character value, default "  " (two spaces). symbol used indentation level.

title: Print diagnostic message — log_message
code: log_message("Hello, ", "world!") #> ℹ [2025-06-11 07:40:01] Hello, world! log_message("Hello, world!", timestamp = FALSE) #> ℹ Hello, world! log_message("Hello, ", "world!", message_type = "success") #> ✔ [2025-06-11 07:40:01] Hello, world! log_message("Hello, world!", message_type = "warning") #> ! [2025-06-11 07:40:01] Hello, world! suppressMessages(log_message("Hello, ", "world!")) log_message("Hello, world!", verbose = FALSE) log_message("Hello, world!", level = 2) #> ℹ [2025-06-11 07:40:01]   Hello, world! log_message("Hello, world!", level = 3, level_symbol = "->") #> ℹ [2025-06-11 07:40:01] ->->Hello, world!
